description.p: Vice is an emulator for a variety of Commodore 8bit machines, including the C16, C64, C128, VIC-20, PET (all models, except SuperPET 9000), Plus-4 and CBM-II (aka C610).
The main Vice package contains the x64 Commodore 64 emulator. The emulators for the other Commodore 8bit machines are available as add-ons to the main Vice package.
